title: Ep 66 | Coronavirus PANIC: Fear of the Unknown, Fear of God, and Fear of the Zombie Apocalypse
description:
Phil, Jase, and Al wonder if the media is overstating the coronavirus panic. That leads to a discussion about fear of the virus, fear of the unknown, fear of God, and of course, fear of the zombie apocalypse. The Robertsons also explain the key to being free of anxiety when everyone else is falling apart and ponder why some people's minds go blank when they try to picture God.

https://SimpliSafe.com/UNASHAMED
